names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Radix Aristolochiae Cinnabariae Radix Aristolochiae Kaemferi

category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

indications: Sores and boils, snake bites, eruptive diseases, cancer

action.primary: Regulates Qi, invigorates the Blood, breaks up Blood Stasis and alleviates pain

notes: This herb inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
It is also said to resolve swelling.
